expo.name: hemingway
expo.description:
Hemingway is a vocabulary building phone game. Players are given various different words and must list as many synonyms of the word as possible. Technologies used include React-Native and Expo.

Upcoming features include:

1.  Synonyms will be sourced through a public thesaurus API.
2.  High score will be saved by cloud DB.
3.  Easy, Medium, Hard levels

Github - https://github.com/Benpong89/hemingway
